scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api-gateway && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd apps/api-gateway && poetry run ruff check
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd apps/api-gateway && poetry run black . && poetry run isort .
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api-gateway && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/api-gateway && poetry run python scripts/reset_db.py
